mapper.select: SELECT Id as id, Password as password, Fullname as fullname, Email as email, Admin as admin, Bio as bio FROM Users
SELECT Id as id, Password as password, Fullname as fullname, Email as email, Admin as admin, Bio as bio FROM Users WHERE Id = #{id}
SELECT Id as id, Password as password, Fullname as fullname, Email as email, Admin as admin, Bio as bio FROM Users WHERE Email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Users (Id, Password, Fullname, Email, Admin, Bio) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{fullname}, #{email}, #{admin}, #{bio})
mapper.update: UPDATE Users SET Password = #{password}, Fullname = #{fullname}, Email = #{email}, Admin = #{admin}, Bio = #{bio} WHERE Id = #{id}
